content.question: The production of the highly detailed pattern design of the Ardabil Carpet was facilitated by the

choices.label: high knot count of the woolen pile
small beads woven into a silk base
thin Egyptian cotton threads of the warp

content.answer: high knot count of the woolen pile

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
